ground_truth.root_cause: `_checkpoint` creates a new epoch with the same timestamp for `increase_amount`, ignoring the new lock in `balanceOfNFT`, reducing voting power.
ground_truth.attack_vector: A test locks 500e18, increases by 500e18 in one tx, and shows reduced bribe rewards compared to separate locks.
ground_truth.correct_fix: In `_checkpoint`, overwrite the latest point if timestamps match, else append a new one. Status: Mitigation confirmed.

notes: Same-tx lock increase creates duplicate checkpoint timestamp, undercalculating voting power.

gold_standard_fields.finding_title: Incorrect voting power calculation when create_lock and increase_amount are called in the same transaction
gold_standard_fields.call_flow: create_lock(amount1) -> increase_amount(amount2) [same tx] -> _checkpoint() duplicate timestamp -> balanceOfNFT ignores increase
